metadata.feature_description: Insert emojis in posts and comments using emoji panel

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream
steps.expected: Activity Stream page loads with post creation area
steps.actual: Activity Stream page loaded successfully with 'Tell the world something...' text area visible

steps.action: Click on emoji button in post editor toolbar
steps.expected: Emoji panel opens showing available emojis
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened displaying People category with various smiley emojis

steps.action: Click on grinning emoji to insert it
steps.expected: Emoji is inserted into the post text area
steps.actual: Grinning emoji was successfully inserted into the post editor

steps.action: With one emoji already in post, open emoji panel and add more emojis
steps.expected: Multiple emojis can be inserted into the same post
steps.actual: Successfully added three emojis (grinning, smiley, smiling imp) to the post

steps.action: Click Share to submit the post with multiple emojis
steps.expected: Post with multiple emojis is published and visible in the feed
steps.actual: Post was shared successfully and appears in the activity stream with all three emojis displayed correctly

steps.action: Click Comment on a post to open comment area
steps.expected: Comment input area opens with emoji button visible
steps.actual: Comment area opened with text input and emoji button in toolbar

steps.action: Click emoji button in comment area
steps.expected: Emoji panel opens for comment input
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened showing available emojis for comment

steps.action: Select relaxed emoji and insert into comment
steps.expected: Emoji is inserted into comment text area
steps.actual: Relaxed emoji was inserted into the comment input field

steps.action: Click Reply to submit comment with emoji
steps.expected: Comment with emoji is posted and visible
steps.actual: Comment was posted successfully showing the relaxed emoji

steps.action: Open emoji panel (default shows People category)
steps.expected: Emoji panel shows People category emojis by default
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened with People category selected, showing smiley faces and human emojis

steps.expected: Panel switches to show nature-themed emojis
steps.actual: Panel switched to Nature category displaying flowers, plants, and animal emojis

steps.expected: Panel switches to show food-themed emojis
steps.actual: Panel switched to Food category displaying fruits, vegetables, and food item emojis

observations: Code review confirms emoji search functionality does not exist in the codebase - there is no search/filter feature for emojis in the EmojiOne implementation
The emoji panel uses the EmojiOne library with sprite-based rendering for performance
Seven emoji categories are available: People, Nature, Food, Celebration, Activity, Travels, and Objects
The ShowEmojiPanel setting can be configured to enable/disable the emoji feature, but no UI setting was found in module settings to test this
